page.title: 04INTERVIEW Withiel Farm
page.content: Maintaining ditches and fences around the farm is essential. If the sheep know that you are in control,they will not bother breaking out. You have to be a far better shepherd on the hills than in the valleys, as the weather is much more extreme. If you are farming minded, it is a very interesting job. One of the main problems is security around the farm. There are many people who steal the sheep. In the next 50 years, changes that may occur could be an emphasis on CONSERVATION. We would be encouraged to plant a lot more trees, and many more people will actually go out and live in the countryside. The farmer has only lived there a few years and is modernising both the farm and the buildings.
